title: Offline job queue visibility
description: Expose queued offline actions with retry controls in the mobile app
acceptanceCriteria: User sees queued actions, can retry/cancel; queue auto-sends when online

title: Payroll export v1
description: Export completed jobs/timesheets to CSV compatible with payroll providers
acceptanceCriteria: CSV downloads include jobs, hours, rates; validated against sample provider

description: Admins can filter, view, and resolve feedback items

title: Localization pack (ES, FR, DE)
description: UI strings localization and locale-aware formatting
acceptanceCriteria: Language toggle persists; dates/currency localized; coverage >90% strings
